general.name: Apple Software Updates
general.description: Configuration profile used for setting software update policies.
general.payloads: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd"> <plist version="1"><dict><key>PayloadUUID</key><string>51ad5c81-3d03-4829-8247-81cff6c527ab</string><key>PayloadType</key><string>Configuration</string><key>PayloadOrganization</key><string>Zero Corp</string><key>PayloadIdentifier</key><string>51ad5c81-3d03-4829-8247-81cff6c527ab</string><key>PayloadDisplayName</key><string>Apple Software Updates</string><key>PayloadDescription</key><string>Configuration profile used for setting software update policies.</string><key>PayloadVersion</key><integer>1</integer><key>PayloadEnabled</key><true/><key>PayloadRemovalDisallowed</key><true/><key>PayloadScope</key><string>System</string><key>PayloadContent</key><array><dict><key>PayloadUUID</key><string>AB09B685-346E-457F-9068-B40ED7819E97</string><key>PayloadType</key><string>com.apple.SoftwareUpdate</string><key>PayloadOrganization</key><string>Jamf</string><key>PayloadIdentifier</key><string>AB09B685-346E-457F-9068-B40ED7819E97</string><key>PayloadDisplayName</key><string>Software Update</string><key>PayloadDescription</key><string/><key>PayloadVersion</key><integer>1</integer><key>PayloadEnabled</key><true/><key>CatalogURL</key><string/><key>AllowPreReleaseInstallation</key><false/><key>AutomaticallyInstallAppUpdates</key><true/><key>AutomaticallyInstallMacOSUpdates</key><true/><key>AutomaticCheckEnabled</key><true/><key>AutomaticDownload</key><true/><key>ConfigDataInstall</key><true/><key>CriticalUpdateInstall</key><true/></dict></array></dict></plist>
